SYSTEM: Ontologies%26multilinguality%40wiki_24-01-08.pdf: Página 33
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
33
Multilinguality in ontologies
3. Modelling
Three ways:
A. Including multilingual information in the 
ontology metamodel
B. Combining the ontology meta-model with a 
mapping model
C. Combining a linguistic information model and an 
ontology metamodel
speaker: SYSTEM
